titleStmt.title: The just and pious scorpionist, or, The nativity of that thrice excellent man, Sir Matthew Hales, late Lord Chief Justice of England who was born in the year of our Lord 1609, on Wednesday Novemb. the first 7h 8' manè, under the cœlestial scorpion, astrologically consider'd / by John Gadbury.
titleStmt.author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Robert Boulter ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
